title: Does MK JOGO give your PC viruses?
body: I was about to downlaod mk jog when my pc said "it may put your pc at risk"? I am wondering if Mk Jogo actually does affect ur pc negatively and give ur pc viruses?

replies.body: MK Jogo is safe but is a non-approved 3rd-party program which is an offensive worthy of a permanent ban if used in game. Trust me, I've had several friends banned for it.

Maybe, maybe not, but MkLol/jogo are explicitly against Riot's 3rd Party Application rules. It includes features that violate the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) and may result in your account being permanently banned if you download it.

If you already have downloaded it, please immediately remove it from your computer. I suggest reading this reminder by Riot Cluvie on the subject; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications

You might think that you can just say you only used skins but riot would actually know if you are, and it can give you a perma suspension

Riot Eambo (EUW)  - 4 months ago

"Does it interfere with the ingame experience?" - Yes
"Does it provide an unfair advantage over other players without this tool?" - Yes

There's two very simple questions that answer yours. Whether you think a feature should or should not be available, if it's not available and you're using it, it's an unfair advantage.

A program that shortens the amount of work you have to do, or even that moves timers from the tab area to another area, is an unfair advantage. Other players do not have this, and it does infact give you a benefit over others - whether it's as simple as not having to press tab, or as complicated as automatically moving your character - all unfair advantages that interact with the game are just that.
